overview: Adam Waters served most recently as COO of Support Intelligence where he brought an extensive background in IP networking, routing, and large scale network operation. Adam served as VP of Engineering for iAsiaWorks (NASDAQ: IAWK) where he oversaw network design and deployment in seven countries across Asia Pacific simultaneously. Additionally, Adam served on the Technical Advisory Committee to the CalREN2 Internet2 network, as Chief Network Engineer for GeoNet Communications (acquired by Level3), as CEO of Vedacore, an ICANN accredited registrar (acquired by Enom), in network operations for InterNex Information Systems (acquired by NTT), and as a technical consultant for Newbridge Capital, iVillage, the San Francisco Chronicle, and others. Adam holds a BA with honors in intellectual history from UC Santa Cruz, and an MBA from UC Davis Graduate School of Management.
